.. _`cs-web-components-base-tree.index.__module__`:

====
Tree
====

.. contents:: Local Navigation
   :local:
   :depth: 2

Description
===========



This module provides diverse components to generically render tree
widgets. The module provides ready-to-use components to display structure
and object data provided by the |elements| server (see
:ref:`cs-web-components-base.tree.ready-to-use`), as well as an API to create
custom tree components (see :ref:`cs-web-components-base.tree.custom-trees`).

.. _`cs-web-components-base.tree.ready-to-use`:

Ready-To-Use Components
-----------------------

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1

- :ref:`cs-web-components-base-tree.StructureTree.StructureTree`
- :ref:`cs-web-components-base-tree.RestTree.RestTree`

.. _`cs-web-components-base.tree.custom-trees`:

Creating custom tree components
-------------------------------

Custom trees are created based on the
:ref:`cs-web-components-base-tree.Tree.__module__` component. Details for
configuring this component can be taken from the components documentation.

- :ref:`cs-web-components-base-tree.Tree.__module__`
- :ref:`cs-web-components-base-tree.TreeFilter.__module__`
- :ref:`cs-web-components-base-tree.TreeContainer.__module__`
- :ref:`cs-web-components-base-tree.TreeRenderer.__module__`
- :ref:`cs-web-components-base-tree.NodeRenderer.__module__`
- :ref:`cs-web-components-base-tree.SearchAdapter.__module__`
